parts: ⇒<reference>たいま<sup>１</sup></reference=219b5:624>, <reference>あま<sup>２</sup></reference=1ac57:60e>, <reference>からむし<sup>１</sup></reference=1d2fa:3c4>, <reference>ジュート</reference=201e9:424>

example_sentences.eng_trans: a shirt made of an 85% cotton, 15% linen fabric.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 綿 85%麻15%の生地でつくったシャツ

example_sentences.eng_trans: This jacket is made of material with linen in it [a linen mixture], so it is very cool. ｜ This jacket has linen in it [contains linen] so it's very cool.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: この上着は麻が混じっているからとても涼しい。

example_sentences.eng_trans: a summer suit made of linen
Anarchy reigned throughout the country. ｜ The entire country was in a state of anarchy.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 天下は麻のごとく乱れた。

example_sentences.eng_trans: Linen is cool but it creases [wrinkles] (easily).
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 麻は涼しいが, しわになりやすい。
